ca.weblite.shared.components.table

Interface TableCellEditor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTableCellEditor, DefaultTableCellEditor, EntityListTableCellEditor

    public interface TableCellEditor

    An interface used for implementing cell editors for the Table class. A cell editor should be able to create a component for a particular cell of a table that supports editing the data in that cell.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Component getTableCellEditorComponent(Table table, Object value, boolean isSelected, int row, int column)
      Creates a component to edit the content of the given row and column of a table.

    • Method Detail

      • getTableCellEditorComponent

        Component getTableCellEditorComponent(Table table,
                                      Object value,
                                      boolean isSelected,
                                      int row,
                                      int column)

        Creates a component to edit the content of the given row and column of a table.

        Parameters:
        table - The table whose cell to edit.
        value - The cell value.
        isSelected - Whether the cell is selected currently.
        row - The row (0-based).
        column - The column (0-based).
        Returns:
        A component to edit the content of the cell.
